products.name: Lemorton 15 Year Old Vieux Calvados
products.description: 15 year old expression from excellent Calvados producer, Lemorton, based in Domfront. Great as a refreshing alternative to whisky for your postprandial tipple.

products.name: La Pavoni ESW-8 Espresso Machine
products.description: The La Pavoni Stradavari eight cup in chrome with wood handles features a 20 oz. boiler, and internal thermostat. This lever model includes nickel plated non-corrosive brass boilers, recessed power switch, dual frothing cappuccino systems, and a reset safety fuse. Includes a 1-year warranty.
